pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, July 4, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement, and hold a media availability. Minister of Canadian Heritage and Multiculturalism Pablo Rodriguez will be in attendance. 

Centre communautaire St-Michel
7501, rue François-Perrault

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:30 a.m. and present themselves to room 204 on the second floor of the community centre.

London, Ontario

6:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Sunfest opening ceremony, and will deliver brief remarks.

Victoria Park
580 Clarence Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 5:45 p.m.
